main event: A female civilian reported observing a cigar-shaped silver object bobbing up and down in Columbus, Ohio on July 8, 1948.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 4 minutes,The object was observed using binoculars,The report states there were 2 objects in total,The investigator's opinion deemed the objects as aircraft,The bobbing movement could be attributed to air distortion.
witness description: female civilian employed in power industry
